title: Ijigen★♥BIGBANG
description: is the theme song for the Ijigen Fes IDOLM@STER★♥Love Live! Uta Gassen concert. It is sung by Uzuki Shimamura, Shizuka Mogami and Kogane Tsukioka as THE iDOLM@STER representatives, and Chika Takami, Ayumu Uehara, Kanon Shibuya and Kaho Hinoshita as the Love Live! representatives. It was pre-released digitally on November 8, 2023, and was later physically released on December 6, 2023.

infobox.Artist: Uzuki Shimamura, Shizuka Mogami, Kogane Tsukioka, Chika Takami, Ayumu Uehara, Kanon Shibuya and Kaho Hinoshita
infobox.Label: Lantis
